name: DBNY
tagline: E-Commerce Design Thinking for Passionate Brands
description:
DBNY is a design-thinking agency, singularly focused on building digital experiences and solutions that change the face and trajectory of brands.
Assembled as a team of design, marketing, and engineering experts — we help merchants create brand-specific experiences that accelerate growth, reduce operational inefficiencies, and improve the lifetime value for their customers. With 25+ years of experience designing in the various fields of marketing & advertising, branding, product design, and engineering — we’ve spent the last five years focused specifically on eCommerce, Automated Retail, Product Design and User Experience Design.
Services Overview
Strategy:  Goal Assessments, Content & Site Audit, Market & Industry Positioning, Business Model Canvassing,  Experience Planning
Design: Rapid Prototyping, Wireframing, User Flows and Purchasing Path Definition, User Experience Design, User Interface & Visual Design
Technology: Front-end & Back-End Development, E-Commerce Development, 3rd Party API & Systems Integration, QA
